titleStmt.title: O. H. Rankin to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2788

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
Independence Kenton Co Ky.
Hon Beriah Magoffin.
Governor of the
Commonwealth of Kentucky:

The recent death of H. Wayman Esq; has caused a vacancy. in the 2nd Magistrate District in Kenton County Ky. and by a special act of the Legislature, this district is always open for business, by giving five days previous notice to the defendant; and as sometime three months will elapse before the next Election, we would suggest the appointment of a magistrate in the place of H Wayman deceased, and would recommend W H. Wilson as a suitable person therefore.

Kenton Co.
J. P. Dis No. 3.
W. H. Wilson
Com Issd Apr 30. 1862
